OOC: No offense, Airshadow, but PLEASE don't post damage for my characters,
even if it's minor, I think of it as my responsibilty to do so. By the way,
the reason I've been absent is because WWF No Mercy is mysteriously
addictive! Sorry, everyone...

Gramps is knocked into the wall from that huge punch by Termitron.

Gramps: Yeah? That so? Well I have a good Human word for your precious
queen! (Bleep), how's that? SHe's dead, YOU should let her be! I'll finish
my job and you can cry afterwards! What do you say about that?

Gramps wlaks right up to Termitron and looks up at him. (Now would be a good
time, Airshadow, he's close and can't dodge damage so easily)

To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>

Subject: Re: Gramps' escape!...


Termitron:::

"LET BE HER!!!!!!" shouted anger Termitron.

He had arrived on time and he saw Gramps in front of  Nightlight's
room, he dashed and with a punch struck Grampsï¿½s head
